description: This file defines route handlers for product-related API endpoints in an Express application, importing controller functions and setting up routes for retrieving products, categories, and individual product details.

methods.name: router.get('/')
methods.description: Handles GET requests to fetch all products.

methods.name: router.get('/categories')
methods.description: Handles GET requests to fetch product categories.

methods.name: router.get('/:id')
methods.description: Handles GET requests to fetch a product by its ID.
